name: Sergey Popov
description: My work ethic and connection to my position is very strong. I deeply enjoy being surrounded by my colleagues, and assisting where I can. At CoolVision I get the feeling that it’s not a ‘workplace’, but rather my second family. I feel supported, solidarity among my peers, and a sense of belonging

name: Anastasia Shapira
description: Cooperation is an important part of my role. Luckily there is a great collaboration between the teams which makes it possible to create a successful product

name: Diego Litman
description: I’ve had a lot of opportunities to be promoted professionally. Not only that, but I also have developed and grown as a person. Thanks to CoolVision

name: Amir Shinar
description: Working with amazing people that always have great ideas, make the work so much fun and easy for me
